item.title: Broken Sapphire RX 480 Nitro
item.description: So recently I laid my hands on this AMD Radeon RX 480. This is 4GB version from Sapphire, Nitro edition. Firstly I took a look on the PCB, cleaned it a little bit, removed solder from the place where someone accidentally removed one of capacitors, added some low quality thermal paste (Thermal Sliver AG). Alpine I connected it via PCI-e riser to the test rig (AMD Athlon 64 x2 5200+ and Gigabyte GA-M57SLI-S4).
